properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ProcessCommandLine contains "DllRegisterServer" and (not(FolderPath endswith "\\rundll32.exe"))

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects when 'DllRegisterServer' is called in the commandline and the image is not rundll32. This could mean that the 'rundll32' utility has been renamed in order to avoid detect
